cue cmd -t prod -t name=bar tag tag.cue tags_tool.cue
cmp stdout expect-stdout

-- expect-stdout --
var: {
    name: "bar"
    env:  "staging"
}
-- tags.cue --
package tags

var: env: "prod" | "staging" @tag(env,short=prod|staging)
var: name: string  @tag(name)

-- tags_tool.cue --
package tags

import "tool/cli"

command: tag: cli.Print & {
    text: var.env
}
